Sub-Zero Repair Los Angeles

Serving Los Angeles with factory-trained Sub-Zero repair experts for luxury appliance service across LA.

✅ Licensed & Insured
✅ 3-month parts & labor warranty
✅ 1-year warranty on sealed system repairs
✅ Same-day or next-day appointments

Whether your Sub-Zero isn’t cooling, your freezer is too warm, or your wine cooler is down, we deliver the expert service Los Angeles homeowners expect.

Luxury Sub-Zero Repair in Los Angeles

At Zaricci, our factory-trained technicians specialize in high-end Sub-Zero appliance repair. We bring precision, discretion, and expertise to every call—from the penthouses of Downtown LA to the homes of Hollywood Hills.

Learn more about Sub-Zero on the official site.

We Repair All Sub-Zero Units:

  • Built-In Refrigerators
  • PRO 36 & PRO 48 Series
  • Integrated Column Refrigerators & Freezers
  • Wine Coolers & Undercounter Fridges
  • Panel-Ready Drawers & Beverage Centers

Most Common Issues We Fix in LA:

  • Refrigerator or freezer not cooling
  • Overheating compressor or loud operation
  • Vacuum condenser light errors
  • Faulty door seals or hinges
  • Fluctuating temperatures
  • Sealed system or control board issues

We use proprietary Sub-Zero diagnostic tools to test your unit’s compressor, sealed system, thermistors, fans, and logic board. No guesswork.

Why LA Clients Choose Zaricci

  • ✅ Sub-Zero certified diagnostic protocols
  • ✅ Same-day availability across Los Angeles
  • ✅ We protect high-end floors and cabinetry
  • ✅ We use genuine Sub-Zero parts—never knockoffs

FAQ

Do you handle warranty service?

We offer out-of-warranty Sub-Zero service using OEM parts. Not affiliated with factory warranty service.

Can I get service today in LA?

In most cases, yes—same-day appointments are available across Los Angeles.
